content: in this legal case a court in turin has declared the dissolution of a community property between two parties referred to as ge and pr dio ge sued pr dio claiming that they were separated due to domestic violence and sought compensation for damages the court found in favor of ge and ordered pr dio to pay a specific amount from a bank account plus interest the court also rejected pr dios objection regarding a previous judgment in albania the bank account was divided equally between the parties ge is entitled to receive eur 919193 while pr dio is entitled to receive eur 919192 pr dio is also responsible for paying the total costs of the proceedings amounting to eur 4835 the courts decision was made on january 1 2018 in turin
